document.full_text: massachusetts might require nonprofits it contracts with to tackle social ills such as homelessness to first obtain private funding, with state payments delayed until the groups show tangible results.
document.title: massachusetts may only pay fruitful social projects
lines_and_colors: massachusetts might require nonprofits it contracts with to tackle social ills such as homelessness to first obtain private funding, with state payments delayed until the groups show tangible results.
